content: a court in milan has issued a final resolution to dissolve the community property between two parties referred to as pa and sa al the court assigned specific properties to each party and ordered a cash settlement to balance the division the court considered the involvement of a mortgage creditor and appointed an expert witness to assess the value of the properties based on the experts report the court determined the assignment of properties and the cash settlement the court rejected claims made by both parties regarding alleged debts and expenses the costs of the proceedings were divided equally between the parties the court has dissolved the community property and assigned specific properties to each party the court also ordered a mortgage to be transferred to a bank in favor of one of the parties the costs of the proceedings have been determined and both parties are responsible for paying them the court has also declared that the banks costs are not recoverable
